header_text: You and your partner have known each other since college. You now have different interests and expectations. You worry that you won't understand each other as you get older.

elements.text: You and your best friend have known each other since grade school. You now work in different fields and have different interests, and you worry that you won't understand each other as you get older. When you think about upcoming major life events, you expect your best friend to be...
